blocks.text:
U
D Alanguage recruitment Permanent Temporary Contract

Are You looking for Exact, Energetic and Effective partner, who can deliver the top-manager whom You imagine to employ? If 'Yes' then let us introduce the UDA language recruitment. The UDA language recruitment is a headhunting agency based in the Ekaterinburg (Ural), Russia. Also we have branches and work with clients in Moscow and St. Petersburg. We specialize in placing staff into professional careers. Our staff has prepared to work for foreign companies and foreign companies are our focus clients. 15 years of experience in the field of multilingual recruitment is not enough to know everything about this business. Therefore we listen to each of our clients as though it were the first patron. We pride on having gained strong professional experience by
working in senior positions in a wide variety of commercial life: Business to business sale Construction and development Finance and banking Hospitality industry Information technology Legal industry profesionals Production and manufacturing Retailing and franchising We have database consisting of more than 230 top managers. They
have rich work experience in various fields, perfect language preparation. We
have the candidates who are ready to compete for high positions such as: Executive offices of subdivisions,
branches, representatives Directors and department heads: marketing and sales Senior managers in finance, banking and controlling Top managers in production and logistic, etc.

What do we need to fulfill your strict demands is to have your specified requirements. Just send us details, which  are important for you. And we will be able to open for you the list of the best Ural professionals. We understand the needs of corporate clients!

Our ethos is to maximise the use of the Internet to speed up
communication with existing and potential clients and candidates. Our work
approach for candidate obtaining is indirect and mild. Therefore, we have strong
reputation for accurate placement of the 'right candidate for the job'. The UDA language recruitment is a member of Ural Distribution
Association (UDA) and we are proud to introduce its full range of services. The
UDA services can be obtained with discount 10% in case of applying for UDA
language recruitment. Send your requests
